properties.areaDesc: 5NM East of a line from Fairport MI to Rock Island Passage; Green Bay North of line from Cedar River MI to Rock Island Passage; Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 6 at 4:26PM EST until January 7 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and waves
2 to 4 feet expected.

* WHERE...Green Bay North of line from Cedar River MI to Rock
Island Passage, Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI and 5NM
East of a line from Fairport MI to Rock Island Passage.

* WHEN...From 3 AM to 8 PM EST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 8 PM EST TUESDAY
